title: Out of the Darkness: A Poets Journey
description: It is possible to hear the designs of heaven in the writing and works of Richard M Knittle Jr. He has the innate ability to inspire those who read and or listen to his work. It is most gratifying to be called friend. Thank you and Blessings each time the moment arrives to renew our acquaintance. Aj HoustonAuthor and Poet
author: Richard M. Knittle Jr.
